rows.name: text_top_1
rows.value:
Someone makes a statement and the other players attempt to show that the person is lying. 

One type of statement is to say something is always true. Examples of this are: all trucks have four wheels, all rectangles are squares, all birds can fly, and the moon comes out at night.

Another type of statement is of the form “if __, then ___ .” Examples of this are: if today is Monday, then it is a school day; if I don’t eat for three hours, then I am hungry; and if a person is taller than someone, then they are older.
